title: A Director’s Work
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Mari-chaaan, club is about to start.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow, it’s time already? Hold on, I’m just going to send this email.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What are you doing, school director’s work?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Something like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let me see~.... Eh, uwaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, no. I just didn’t expect you to do actual work. I didn’t know a director gets these many emails....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s not a big deal once you get used to it. It’s just like mastering basic dance steps. Your hands will just move on their own.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>....You got this good because you’ve done this countless times already, huh.... You’re really amazing, Mari-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, did your opinion of me improve~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!? D-, don’t say that with such a serious face, You~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
